segments.text: Hey John , did you register for classes yet ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I register this Friday .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: What classes do you plan on taking ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I really want to take the communication class , but I don't know if it will be available .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Is that class really that popular ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yeah . I tried to get in last semester , but it was full by the time I registered .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: What other classes are you going to take ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I still need to take English 201 , but I really don't like writing .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I took that class already . There is a lot of writing , but it's not that bad .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Oh really ? Who was the instructor ? There are like 4 different instructors to choose from .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I had Professor Mahoney .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Is he an easy grader ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I'm not sure if he is or not , but I thought he was definitely fair .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Do you mind if I ask you what you got ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Not at all . I got a 3.8 .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , what did you get in English 101 last year ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I got a 4.0 in that class .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , I can't compare to you . I got a 3.1 in English 101 . That means if you got a lower grade in English 201 , it must be harder .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: It's not what it appears . I actually tried harder in the 101 class . If I put as much effort into the 201 class , I would have received the same grade .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Oh . That helps . Thanks .
segments.speaker: S2
